mapper.select: SELECT rownum, member_id, name, nickname, email, tel, birthday, member_level, kakao_no, member_role, status, last_login_date, point, reg_date, address1, address2 FROM ( SELECT rownum, member_id, name, nickname, email, tel, birthday, member_level, kakao_no, member_role, status, last_login_date, point, reg_date, address1, address2 FROM ( SELECT m.member_id, m.name, nickname, email, m.tel, birthday, member_level, kakao_no, member_role, status, last_login_date, point, reg_date, address1, address2 FROM member m, address a WHERE m.member_id = a.member_id(+) AND m.member_role = 'ROLE_USER' AND (a.default_address = '1' OR a.default_address IS NULL) ORDER BY m.reg_date ) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo} ) WHERE rownum >= #{startRowNo}
SELECT count(*) FROM member m, address a WHERE m.member_id = a.member_id(+) AND m.member_role = 'ROLE_USER' AND (a.default_address = '1' OR a.default_address IS NULL)

SELECT m.name orderName, m.tel orderTel, a.name deliveryName, a.tel deliveryTel, a.zip_code, a.address1, a.address2 FROM member m, address a WHERE m.member_id = a.member_id AND m.member_id = #{memberId} AND a.default_address = '1'
